about.summary: Experienced full-stack web developer with over 8 years of expertise in PHP and Laravel development. I have strong proficiency in modern frontend frameworks including React (Next.js), Vue (Nuxt.js), and Svelte (SvelteKit), along with a preference for Tailwind CSS though I'm adaptable to any CSS framework. Beyond coding, I bring experience in team leadership, mentorship, and architecting scalable applications. I'm passionate about best practices including TDD, CI/CD, and Docker-based development. I prioritize security, code quality, and collaborative teamwork, and I'm always eager to learn and grow under exceptional leadership.

projects.name: Localhooks
projects.description: Localhooks.dev is a powerful tool designed to simplify webhook testing in local development environments. It eliminates the need for temporary ngrok URLs and provides a permanent solution for testing webhook integrations.

projects.name: Laravel CI
projects.description: A collection of Docker images specifically crafted for running GitLab CI/CD pipelines for Laravel projects. These images are personally maintained and optimized for Laravel development workflows.

workExperience.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
keyResponsibilities: Design and architect complex web applications, considering scalability and performance
Demonstrate expert-level knowledge and proficiency in both front-end and back-end technologies
Design and optimize database schemas, considering data relationships and integrity
Identify and implement performance optimizations to enhance application speed and efficiency
Collaborate with teams to facilitate smooth application deployment and continuous integration
Provide mentorship and guidance, promoting professional growth
Write comprehensive code documentation to facilitate future maintenance and collaboration
Lead code reviews and provide constructive feedback to improve code quality
Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in full-stack development

workExperience.title: Senior Full Stack Web Developer & Team Leader
workExperience.note: My first official company that hired and trusted me, creating a deep connection. Transitioned to contractor status to have more control over my time while maintaining our strong working relationship.
careerJourney: Started as part-time student developer working on Laravel, WordPress and Magento sites
Helped company transition to Laravel framework for modern web development
Implemented CI/CD pipelines across projects for automated testing and deployment
Self-taught TDD practices to improve code quality and reliability
Established Docker-based development environments for consistent team workflows
Handled large-scale projects with extensive codebases and high-value transactions
Created accurate project time estimates and maintained reasonable development hours
Currently managing a team of Laravel developers as Team Leader
Conducting junior developer training sessions and mentorship programs
keyResponsibilities: Project planning, estimation, development, and deployment for client projects
Collaboration with design teams on UI/UX, animations, effects, and user interactions
Communication with project managers on progress, scope changes, and client requirements
Maintenance and bug fixes for existing legacy projects
Server infrastructure coordination with operations team for hosting and software setup
Third-party API integrations (Stripe, Magento, Vipps, and various service providers)
Standardized team development environment and tooling through comprehensive documentation
Implemented CI/CD best practices and automated testing across projects
Created and maintained project documentation from inception to deployment and maintenance

workExperience.title: Working Student
workExperience.description: Non-academic scholarship program at Asian College of Technology - IEF where I served as an office assistant while pursuing my Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology. This role provided valuable professional development through training in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) and essential office skills.
workExperience.impact: This experience significantly contributed to my career growth by developing my communication skills, understanding of teamwork in professional environments, and navigating office dynamics.

education.address: Pantaleon del Rosario St, Cebu City, 6000 Cebu
education.description: During the early days of my college adventure, I excelled in areas of programming and basic computer knowledge. I then applied for a non-academic scholarship (Working Student program) at the school. During my application, we were trained to be experts in certain areas, like Microsoft Excel, MS Word, MS PowerPoint, and all other necessary skills needed for an office assistant worker to perform on the job.
education.impact: This experience helped me a lot to boost my career. I learned how to communicate with people, I learned about teamwork in the office, and even understood office politics.

education.address: Gov. M. Cuenco Ave, Cebu City, 6000 Cebu

investments.description: I believe in continuously investing in tools, resources, and education that enhance my productivity and professional growth. Here are some of the key investments I've made:

items.name: MacBook Pro M4
items.description: My primary device for both work and personal projects, invested in for optimal performance and reliability in my development career.

items.name: Laracast - Personal Lifetime Subscription
items.description: Comprehensive Laravel and PHP education platform providing lifetime access to courses, tutorials, and best practices.

items.name: Test-Driven Laravel Course - Given For Free By The Author
items.description: A comprehensive video course on designing robust Laravel applications with TDD, covering real-world scenarios and best practices.

items.name: TablePlus - Personal License
items.description: Modern database management tool that helps me efficiently work with MySQL, PostgreSQL, and other databases.

items.name: Cursor AI Code Editor - Personal Subscription
items.description: AI-powered code editor that enhances my development workflow and productivity through intelligent code assistance.
